name: dad simulator (camreon)
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2016. Theme is Rituals. In this game you are the dad and you must get your kid to do his daily rituals like eat dinner, take a bath, do his homework, brush teeth, go to bed. Meanwhile the kid is doing everything in his power to not do his daily rituals!

Dev: Ernest McCracken

Dev: Cameron Guthrie

Music: Will Padgett
